mapper.select: SELECT B.GBN_CD , B.CODE , B.CODE_NAME , (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ RGB WHERE RGB.CNTR_NO = B.CNTR_NO AND RGB.CNTR_SN = B.CNTR_SN AND RGB.VST_DV_CD = '20') > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) AS TAKBE_YN , NVL((SELECT (CASE WHEN T2.SPP_STP_DV_CD = B.GBN_CD AND (T2.TN1_STP_YM = B.CODE OR T2.TN2_STP_YM = B.CODE OR T2.TN3_STP_YM = B.CODE OR T2.TN4_STP_YM = B.CODE) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) FROM TB_SVPD_SLF_MNGT_SPP_STP_AK_IZ T2 WHERE T2.CNTR_NO = B.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = B.CNTR_SN AND T2.AK_SN = (SELECT MAX(M.AK_SN) FROM TB_SVPD_SLF_MNGT_SPP_STP_AK_IZ M WHERE M.CNTR_NO = B.CNTR_NO AND M.CNTR_SN = B.CNTR_SN ) ), 'N') AS CHECK_YN FROM ( SELECT 'A' AS GBN_CD , SUBSTR(A.VST_DUEDT, 1, 6) AS CODE , SUBSTR(A.VST_DUEDT, 1, 4) || '년 ' || SUBSTR(A.VST_DUEDT, 5, 2) || '월 (' || TO_CHAR(A.RN) || '회)' AS CODE_NAME , A.CNTR_NO , A.CNTR_SN FROM ( SELECT T1.VST_DUEDT , T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY T1.CNTR_NO ORDER BY T1.VST_DUEDT ASC) AS RN FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ T1 WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn}) AND T1.VST_DUEDT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') || '01' AND T1.VST_DV_CD = '20' ) A WHERE A.RN <= 4 UNION ALL SELECT 'B' AS GBN_CD , '999912' AS CODE , '무기한 중지' AS CODE_NAME , '' AS CNTR_NO , NULL AS CNTR_SN FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'C' AS GBN_CD , '' AS CODE , '배송중지 해제' AS CODE_NAME , '' AS CNTR_NO , NULL AS CNTR_SN FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'D' AS GBN_CD , '' AS CODE , '특정날짜 배송요청' AS CODE_NAME , '' AS CNTR_NO , NULL AS CNTR_SN FROM DUAL ) B

SELECT SUBSTR(A.FST_RGST_DTM, 1, 8) AS AK_DT , A.CNTR_NO , A.SPP_STP_DV_CD , (SELECT T1.PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 WHERE T1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.OG_TP_CD = A.OG_TP_CD AND T1.PRTNR_NO = A.PRTNR_NO ) AS PRTNR_KNM , (SELECT T1.PRTNR_NO FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 WHERE T1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.OG_TP_CD = A.OG_TP_CD AND T1.PRTNR_NO = A.PRTNR_NO ) AS PRTNR_NO , (SELECT T1.OG_NM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 WHERE T1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.OG_TP_CD = A.OG_TP_CD AND T1.PRTNR_NO = A.PRTNR_NO ) AS OG_NM , (CASE WHEN A.APY_DT IS NOT NULL THEN '완료' ELSE '반영예정' END ) AS STAT , A.SPP_AK_SPF_DT , A.APY_DT , A.TN1_STP_YM , A.TN2_STP_YM , A.TN3_STP_YM , A.TN4_STP_YM , (SELECT M.PD_ABBR_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS M WHERE M.PD_CD = (SELECT T2.BASE_PD_CD FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 WHERE A.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND A.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN) ) AS PD_NM FROM TB_SVPD_SLF_MNGT_SPP_STP_AK_IZ A WHERE A.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND A.CNTR_SN = TO_NUMBER(#{cntrSn}) ORDER BY A.AK_SN DESC
